Our friend Atli sent us this story from Iceland:

This is the ThinkPad Yoga 260 from one of my colleagues. It got left out in the rain last night on top of the family car and, when they left for work this morning and applied their brakes, the poor ThinkPad (still on the roof) went flying through the air and smack into a puddle in the asphalt. Unsurprisingly, the machine was absolutely dead when it was delivered to me so I took it completely apart, used a heat gun on it for a solid hour and actually got it running again. The display is pretty much wasted but the touchscreen works, the machine works great and I am now recovering all the data from it. It is astounding that it even turned on again. #ThinkPadsAreAmazing
